extendedIngredients.name: avocado
extendedIngredients.original: 1 ripe avocado, peeled, pitted and cut into ¼-inch cubes
extendedIngredients.originalName: ripe avocado, peeled, pitted and cut into ¼-inch cubes

extendedIngredients.name: boston lettuce
extendedIngredients.original: 1 large head of Boston/butterhead lettuce (or an equivalent amount of bibb lettuce), leaves separated
extendedIngredients.originalName: Boston/butterhead lettuce (or an equivalent amount of bibb lettuce), leaves separated

extendedIngredients.name: cilantro
extendedIngredients.original: 1 green onion, roots and wilted outer leaves removed, thinly sliced crosswise or a little chopped cilantro, for garnish
extendedIngredients.originalName: green onion, roots and wilted outer leaves removed, thinly sliced crosswise or a little chopped cilantro, for garnish

extendedIngredients.name: fish
extendedIngredients.original: 1 to 1 ¼ lbs sashimi-grade boneless skinless fish (tuna, snapper and salmon are options you'll likely find), cut into ½-inch cubes OR about 1 to 1 ¼ lbs medium-to-small cooked shrimp

extendedIngredients.name: green chile

title: Ceviche Salad With Avocado, Cilantro And Green Chile
summary: The recipe Ceviche Salad With Avocado, Cilantro And Green Chile could satisfy your South American craving in roughly 45 minutes. This recipe serves 4 and costs $3.56 per serving. One portion of this dish contains approximately 25g of protein, 9g of fat, and a total of 219 calories. This recipe from fronterafiesta.com has 1 fans. Not a lot of people really liked this main course. It is a good option if you're following a caveman, gluten free, dairy free, and primal diet. A mixture of chile, boston/butterhead lettuce, lime juice, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so flavorful. To use up the salt you could follow this main course with the Apple Turnovers Recipe as a dessert. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 86%. This score is super. Similar recipes include Fingerling Potato Salad with Green Chile-Cilantro Salsa, Dinner Tonight: Fingerling Potato Salad with Green Chile-Cilantro Salsa, and Green Chile Cilantro Pesto.
